A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Quite honestly the single worst Star Wars movie ever made\, and I don't say that lightly. It betrays the characters\, the canon\, and the conventions of good filmmaking. It subverts nothing\, the new characters all universally suck\, all the while trying to be like Zack Snyder and failing horribly.\nFor further elaboration\, see the full article I wrote on my website: http://blogdudesvariousreviews.blogspot.com/2018/01/star-wars-episode-viii-last-jedi.html
